headline: Robinhood Expands Desktop Trading Platform to UK
summary: Robinhood Markets, Inc. (NASDAQ:HOOD) launched its desktop trading platform in the UK on May 28. This move extends the company’s advanced trading tools to 11 million traders in the country, and comes months after Robinhood Legend was unveiled for American users in October 2024. According to the company, the desktop platform addresses growing demand from […]

headline: Carillon ClariVest Capital Appreciation Fund Q1 2025 Commentary
summary: At the start of the quarter, the Fund was most overweight the financials and healthcare sectors and most underweight consumer discretionary and materials.

raw.headline: Carillon ClariVest Capital Appreciation Fund Q1 2025 Commentary

headline: Robinhood rolls out desktop trading in UK to target seasoned retail investors
summary: (Reuters) -U.S.-based online brokerage Robinhood said on Wednesday it was expanding its desktop platform into the UK to extend its reach among retail investors looking for more sophisticated trading tools.  Retail investors are increasingly viewing trading as an alternative career path to build wealth and strengthen their financial health, rather than just a hobby.  To cater to their evolving needs, firms such as Robinhood are rolling out additional features typically reserved for more advanced traders.
